content.rendered:
[vc_row type=”container”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Interested in private labeling or customized products? We can build our products engraved with your company’s logo at a competitive price. If you’re looking for something you don’t see on our website contact us and we can build it.

  • In-house engineering can build products to your specifications
  • Custom laser engraving available on all products
  • Various finishes and anodize available for some products
  • All products come with a 1 year manufacturer’s warranty
  • Built to quality standards trusted for over 35 years

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_gallery type=”flexslider_slide” interval=”3″ images=”72538,72076,72621,72494″ img_size=”400×267″ css=”.vc_custom_1574791095623{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_separator color=”#e5e5e5″ type=”normal” thickness=”1″ up=”” down=””][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

OEM Products

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

We pride ourselves in not only working directly with our customers, but also working with distributors and manufacturers as well. Every line of our products is established in the industry, and we have distributors around the world who have trusted our tried and tested designs for their customers for over 35 years.

If you would like to purchase our products with your company’s branding we offer in-house laser engraving to match your specifications. If you are looking for something we don’t already carry we can build it for you at a competitive price.

Request a Quote

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_tta_tabs color=”white” active_section=”1″][vc_tta_section title=”Compatibility” tab_id=”1569386751404-824b66ba-0d54d4e1-3c40″][vc_column_text]

A cornerstone of our products is the concept of modularity. Everything we build is designed with compatibility in mind, and if our products aren’t compatible with the equipment you have in mind they can be built to be.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Regulatory” tab_id=”1569386751419-a33a2db6-6e3dd4e1-3c40″][vc_column_text]

TTI Medical is a manufacturer of class 1 and 2 devices, and our products are approved to bear the CE mark.

TTI Medical is registered with the FDA and ISO 13485:2016 certified.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Warranty” tab_id=”1569387831165-1b59dea1-014ad4e1-3c40″][vc_column_text]

All of our products include at minimum a 1 year manufacturer’s warranty and support for the usable lifetime of the product.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row]
